forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later in the day. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later in the day. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later in the day. High 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. High near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low around -5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 23F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.
